summary: "Zodiac" is a 2007 mystery thriller film directed by David Fincher, based on true events. It stars Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, and Robert Downey Jr. The movie tells the story of the hunt for the Zodiac Killer, who terrorized San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s. The killer sent taunting letters and ciphers to newspapers. Fincher and the writers did extensive research on the case. The film was well-received and made over $84 million worldwide.
title: Zodiac (film)
